Class.name: IFileHashesComputer
Class.summary: Interface defining a contract for computing hash values for multiple files asynchronously.

Instance.name: ComputeHashesAsync[IEnumerable<EntryPath>]
Instance.summary: Computes the hash values for the specified collection of files asynchronously.
Instance.param: The collection of file paths for which to compute the hash values.
Instance.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation. The task result is a dictionary mapping file paths to their respective computed hash values.
